description: temporary help services for the department of national defense. The services are for the National Capital Region.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement for Temporary Help Services
=============================================

### Tender Details

*   **Procurement Number**: S4748602
*   **Publication Date**: December 14, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 18, 2023 (15:30)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None
*   **Procurement Status**: Expired

### Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services. The requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the following streams and categories:

*   **Category 13.9 Special Advisor**

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC. (Joint Venture)
*   ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
*   BDO Canada LLP
*   BurntEdge Incorporated
*   Calian Ltd.
*   DBHS Security Consulting Inc
*   eVision Inc., SoftSim Technologies Inc. (Joint Venture)
*   Gomes Consulting Enterprises Ltd.
*   H2 Analytics Inc.
*   OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION (Joint Venture)
*   Promaxis Systems Inc
*   TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
*   TDV Global inc.
*   Thinkpoint Inc.
*   V42 Management Consulting, Inc.

### Considerations and Security Requirements

*   **Level of Security Requirement**: Secret

Refer to the tender notice and the document attachments for more information on the requirements and guidelines for responding to the tender.[*](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27473/s4748602-rfp-method-2.pdf)

 Contact Information
----------------
For more information on this tender, please contact the Contracting Authority at:

*   **Contact Name**: CFSG (O-G) Temporary Help
*   **Contact Email**: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdai@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdai@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Phone**: (613) 971-7955
